description: misc/cgo/test: check API compatibility for cgo pseudo-functions

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

because C.int could in theory change from platform to platform
i wonder if it's more correct to fix those to use Go's int instead
(yes, this means an API change)

or at least use int32 consistently.

PS: for more backgrounds, see https://codereview.appspot.com/9667047
and https://codereview.appspot.com/9643044

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=4ae1bb001f75 ***

misc/cgo/test: check API compatibility for cgo pseudo-functions

R=golang-dev, iant
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/9826043
